  OOC: Please stop the violence towards spid=
ers. Why does everyone feel they
  should kill spiders? I happen to be a sp=
ider person, not a cat person, not a
  dog person, but a spider person. The=
 senseless killing of spiders is
  upsetting me, and I don't want to read a=
ny post with violence towards
  spiders in it. I'll have to ignore things l=
ike that. I don't mean the
  violence, the whole mail is what I mean. I'm s=
erious...

otmail.com>

  > ::Feline::
  >
  > She went running along t=
hrough the dence undergrowth.  She felt like
  herold
  > self again.  She =
came to a small pod which appeared to have been there for
  a
  > long time=
. She looked around, but didn't smell any other bots near by.
  She
  > tra=
nformed into bot mode and checked out the pod.  She smiled and wondered
  >=
 if it was the answer to her situation. "Perhaps I can use this to fix up
 =
 my
  > little cruiser."  She opened up a panel and stuck her hand inside, =
trying
  to
  > find the release mechanism for the propulsion ciruits.  She=
 pulled her
  hand
  > back as she felt something sharp puncture her skin. =
 She saw a strange
  > spider biting her arm.  "Get off me you little insec=
t."(yes I know a
  spider
  > is an arachnid and not an insect)
  > She thr=
ew it to the ground and stepped on it, crushing it under her foot.
  > She =
sneered at the pod. "I'll not touch that thing again if it's going to
  > b=
ite me back like that."
  > With that, she transformed into leopard mode an=
d continued on her way.
